ditto + Sencha ExtJS Example

This example shows how to use the ditto ReportViewer and ReportDesigner components in an ExtJS 6 application.

Note that the js is not minified so it is readable. See ditto-extjs-demo.js.

Note: If you are running this example locally, you will need to replace the path to ext-all.js in index.html with the correct path to ExtJS on your system.
